hooks.command: if [ -f "$ACADEMICOPS_BOT/hooks/validate_tool.py" ]; then uv run --directory "$ACADEMICOPS_BOT" python "$ACADEMICOPS_BOT/hooks/validate_tool.py"; else echo '{"continue":true,"systemMessage":"Hook not found: validate_tool.py"}'; fi

if [ -f "$ACADEMICOPS_BOT/hooks/validate_stop.py" ]; then uv run --directory "$ACADEMICOPS_BOT" python "$ACADEMICOPS_BOT/hooks/validate_stop.py" SubagentStop || echo '{"continue":true}'; else echo '{"continue":true}'; fi

if [ -f "$ACADEMICOPS_BOT/hooks/validate_stop.py" ]; then uv run --directory "$ACADEMICOPS_BOT" python "$ACADEMICOPS_BOT/hooks/validate_stop.py" Stop || echo '{"continue":true}'; else echo '{"continue":true}'; fi
if [ -f "$ACADEMICOPS_BOT/hooks/log_posttooluse.py" ]; then uv run --directory "$ACADEMICOPS_BOT" python "$ACADEMICOPS_BOT/hooks/log_posttooluse.py"; else echo '{}'; fi
if [ -f "$ACADEMICOPS_BOT/hooks/log_userpromptsubmit.py" ]; then uv run --directory "$ACADEMICOPS_BOT" python "$ACADEMICOPS_BOT/hooks/log_userpromptsubmit.py"; else echo '{}'; fi
